EmailTemplate.description: Alert Task Updation - Internal Comm/Portal Auto-Trigger
EmailTemplate.name: Tech Pubs-Alert Task Updation
EmailTemplate.subject: Alert for Inbound email - Task created : {!Case.Case_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
This is to inform that you have an Inbound email and new Open tasks related to the Case {!Case.Case_Number__c}.
Please click below to go to the Case detail page.
{!Case.Link}
Honeywell Aerospace
Customer & Product Support
Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
